trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Pinon hills
There were no other sightings in Pinon hills on or around August 24th 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsI saw a huge, completely black rectangular object come from the hills. It was about 200-300 feet off the ground and flew directly over my house. I called my fiance out to verify I wasn't seeing things. I was in a state of panick, my fiance was hypntotized by the object. As I saw it fly over my house, I noticed it had rings on the bottom of it, they appeared red in color. It looked like a spaceship, and dull gray in color, like a warship. Nohing like the UFO's you normally see. It continued to fly past my house, and in a bright flash of light dissapeared from sight. From the other reports, it sounds as if it was making a travel from one airbase, to another, as I live close to Edwards Airforce base. Just thought I would share what I had seen..
Summary: Huge airship rectangular, similiar to San Diego sightings
